title: holistic view
extract: A holistic approach means thinking about the big picture. ... In a medical setting, holistic refers to addressing the whole person, including their physical, mental, and emotional health, while taking social factors into consideration.
extract_html: A holistic approach means thinking about the big picture. ... In a medical setting, holistic refers to addressing the whole person, including their physical, mental, and emotional health, while taking social factors into consideration.
